content: This is a list of recipients of the [Darjah Utama Bakti Cemerlang](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Bakti_Cemerlang), a [national honour](/wiki/Orders,_decorations,_and_medals_of_Singapore) instituted in 1968. The honour was formerly known as *Pingat Bakti Chemerlang* from 1963 to 1967*.* ## Recipients ### Pingat Bakti Cemerlang (1963–1967) YearRecipientNotesRef.1963[Phay Seng Whatt](/wiki/Phay_Seng_Whatt)Chairman, [Public Service Commission](/wiki/Public_Service_Commission_(Singapore))1964[Puan Noor Aishah](/wiki/Puan_Noor_Aishah)For contributions to social welfare1966[Albert Winsemius](/wiki/Albert_Winsemius)Economic adviser to [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)1967[George Bogaars](/wiki/George_Bogaars)Permanent secretary, [Ministry of the Interior and Defence](/wiki/Ministry_of_Defence_(Singapore))[Hon Sui Sen](/wiki/Hon_Sui_Sen)Chairman, [Economic Development Board](/wiki/Economic_Development_Board) ### Darjah Utama Bakti Cemerlang (1968–present) YearRecipientNotesRef.1968[Howe Yoon Chong](/wiki/Howe_Yoon_Chong) -
